thread.title: Win a £350 holiday voucher

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a £350 holiday voucher
text: Have you been inspired by the golden sands, rugged cliffs or hidden coves of Britain? The reader who sends in the best entry will win a DialAFlight voucher. DialAFlight (0844 556 6060; dialaflight.com ) is one of Britain’s top travel companies, offering tailor-made travel to destinations worldwide. Whether you are looking to fly to the Caribbean, long for a round-the-world adventure or are simply seeking a short break, DialAFlight’s 300-strong team can assist. No itinerary is too big or too complicated and DialAFlight prides itself on offering some of the most competitively priced air fares in the industry. It also offers deals on hotels, escorted tours and car hire. The prize Win a £350 travel voucher to spend on a holiday with DialAFlight. Choose from a range of trips and flights to worldwide destinations including Africa, Asia, Canada, the Caribbean, New Zealand, Australia, India and the US. Experience two sides of South Africa, with 40 per cent off a South Africa – Cape Town and Safari break . Spend nine days exploring Cape Town’s city, islands, beaches and vineyards and then spot the Big Five at Lalibela’s game reserve. The tour costs from £1,599 per person and includes eight nights’ accommodation, game drives, most meals and flights with Air France or KLM (London). Departures until December 15 2015. Or stay at Dubai’s Jumeirah Beach Hotel, saving £600 per room, plus a free room upgrade. Recently refurbished, the wave-like hotel is great for all ages, with activities, wonderful dining and a luxurious spa. Three nights costs from £769 per person and includes bed and breakfast (two sharing) and flights with KLM or Air France (London). Departures July 22- August 28 2015. Submissions Email your entries (no more than 150 words, please) together with your name, address and telephone number, by midnight on Wednesday July 8, 2015 , to yoursay@telegraph.co.uk. The £350 DialAFlight voucher can be used for travel departing within one year of the competition date, subject to availability. It is redeemable against one booking only (international travel only), made within six months of the competition date. The prize is non-transferable and no cash alternative is available. Only one prize voucher can be won per person per year. All bookings are subject to DialAFlight’s booking terms and conditions which can be viewed in full at dialaflight.com. Other terms and conditions apply. For details, email yoursay@telegraph.co.uk. Follow @telegraphtravel
